courseDetails.desc: Master advanced AI tools to surpass your colleagues, develop high-level strategies using data-driven insights, and ensure industry relevance.

courseOverview.title: What you'll learn
courseOverview.desc: The AI-Enhanced Digital Marketing Mastery program equips you with cutting-edge skills to excel in today’s dynamic marketing landscape. Over three months, you’ll dive deep into the essentials of digital marketing, learning how AI tools transform website optimization, SEO, content creation, and social media management. From building high-converting websites to mastering PPC campaigns and email automation, this course blends foundational knowledge with practical implementation. With a focus on real-world applications, hands-on projects, and emerging technologies like AI-powered analytics and chatbots, this program ensures you stay ahead in the competitive digital marketing space.

overviewList.listItem: Build and optimize websites, social media campaigns, and PPC ads with AI-driven tools.
Master SEO, content marketing, and email automation to enhance campaign effectiveness.
Explore eCommerce strategies, including retargeting and AI-based competitive pricing.
Learn emerging technologies like predictive analytics, chatbots, and workflow automation.
Leverage AI-powered analytics for data-driven decision-making and improved ROI.
Create personalized marketing strategies for hyper-targeted and customer-centric campaigns.
Gain industry-ready skills using tools like Google Analytics, SEMrush, ChatGPT, and Hootsuite.
Complete hands-on projects and a capstone to build a portfolio and showcase expertise.

listItem.text: Definition, Importance, and Scope of Digital Marketing
Understanding Paid, Owned, and Earned Media.
Key Metrics: CTR, CAC, ROI, LTV.
Overview of Marketing Funnels: Awareness to Conversion.
Analyze a brand’s digital marketing funnel and suggest AI-driven improvements.
Types of Websites: Static, Dynamic, eCommerce.
Principles of UX/UI for High-Converting Websites.
Setting up a website using CMS (e.g., WordPress).
Essentials: Hosting, Domain Registration, SSL Certificates.
Introduction to Analytics Tools for Websites (Google Analytics, Hotjar).
Build a responsive website or landing page for a demo product.
Optimize for speed, mobile responsiveness, and user experience.
The Role of AI in SEO for Real-Time Insights and Optimizations.
Keyword Discovery Tools (SEMrush, Ahrefs, Google AI).
AI for On-Page Optimization: Meta Tags, Image Compression, Internal Links.
Conducting Technical SEO Audits with AI Tools.
Perform an AI-driven SEO audit for a demo website.
Optimize keywords and improve technical SEO metrics.
The Role of Content in Digital Marketing Strategies.
AI Tools for Content Creation (ChatGPT, Jasper, Canva).
Optimizing Content for SEO Using AI-Driven Insights.
Create an AI-generated blog post and schedule its distribution using AI tools.
Analyze performance using engagement metrics (BuzzSumo, Hotjar).
Social Media’s Role in Marketing Funnels.
Automating Campaigns with AI Tools (Hootsuite, Sprout Social).
Optimizing Content for SEO Using AI-Driven Insights.
Using AI for Ad Targeting and Persona Development.
Design and automate a week-long social media campaign for a demo brand.
Fundamentals of PPC Advertising: Google Ads, Social Media Ads.
Campaign Setup: Search, Display, Shopping, and Video Ads.
A/B Testing Using AI for Copy and Visual Optimization.
Create, launch, and optimize a PPC campaign using AI tools.
Using AI to Write Personalized Subject Lines and Content.
Tracking Key Metrics (Open Rate, CTR, Conversions).
Design an AI-driven email drip campaign for a demo product.
Retargeting and Upselling Strategies Using AI.
Setting up and Managing Google Shopping Ads.
AI-Driven Competitive Pricing and Recommendation Systems.
Develop an optimized eCommerce ad campaign for a demo store.
Basics of Voice and Visual Search Optimization.
Design a simple chatbot for a demo business and integrate it with a website.
Combine SEO, PPC, Content, and Social Media Strategies into a comprehensive marketing strategy.
Create a complete marketing strategy for a real or simulated business.
Prepare a detailed report with dashboards, insights, and results.
Build a portfolio showcasing all hands-on projects completed during the course.
Create, launch, and optimize a PPC campaign using AI tools.

detailsList.listItem: Basic Knowledge of Digital Marketing
Familiarity with AI Tools
Practical Assignments
Final Project
Assessments
Participation in Discussions/Forums
Course Duration Completio
Understanding of SEO, SEM, and content marketing.
Use of AI in campaigns and automation
AI-driven digital marketing plan.
Quizzes and exams.
Engage in discussions/forums.

courseTab.desc: Master Python by building 100 projects in 100 days. Learn data science, automation, build websites, games and apps!

courseOverview.title: What you'll learn
courseOverview.desc: Are you new to PHP or need a refresher? Then this course will help you get all the fundamentals of Procedural PHP, Object Oriented PHP, MYSQLi and ending the course by building a CMS system similar to WordPress, Joomla or Drupal. Knowing PHP has allowed me to make enough money to stay home and make courses like this one for students all over the world.

courseOverview.title: What you'll learn
courseOverview.desc: Are you new to PHP or need a refresher? Then this course will help you get all the fundamentals of Procedural PHP, Object Oriented PHP, MYSQLi and ending the course by building a CMS system similar to WordPress, Joomla or Drupal. Knowing PHP has allowed me to make enough money to stay home and make courses like this one for students all over the world.
